doc:
Prince Markie Dee https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Prince_Markie_Dee 0 Mark Anthony Morales (born February 19, 1968), better known by the stage name Prince Markie Dee, is an American rapper, songwriter, producer, and radio personality of Puerto Rican descent. Morales is a member of the Fat Boys, a pioneering rap group that gained fame during the 1980s, and has recently reformed. Morales is currently the vice-president of Uncle Louie Music Group. Mark_Anthony_Morales ( born February_19_,_1968 ) , better_known by the_stage_name_Prince_Markie_Dee , is an_American_rapper , songwriter , producer , and radio_personality of Puerto_Rican_descent . Morales is a_member of the_Fat_Boys , a_pioneering_rap_group that gained fame during the_1980s , and has_recently_reformed . Morales is currently the_vice-president of Uncle_Louie_Music_Group .
